content.rendered:
Directed by Chakri Toleti.

Written by Dheeraj Rattan.

Cast Prabhu Deva(Dev (as Prabhudheva)). Tamannaah Bhatia(Surbhi). Bhoomika Chawla(Mrs. Desai) . Deepak Anand(Lawyer Deepakji). Beena Banerjee(Maid / Karuna). Vikram Bhatt(Dev’s Father). Malini Kapoor(Dev’s Mother (as Shalini Kapoor)). Akash Khurana(Anand – Lawyer). Vipin Sharma(Mustaq / Pasha). Sanjay Suri(Mr. Kishor Desai)

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Vashu Bhagnani. Vivek Bhatnagar. Shoaib Ibrahim. Sameer Qasim Isa. Saurabh Mishra. Mohaan Nadaar. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Indo-UK Film Company. Manvi Production. PYX Films.
